page.title: 12TOURISM.
page.content: This area is popular because some people stay for holidays, visiting friends or on business. Some people stay in hotels or self catering. People staying in hotels could go to Coombe Cross or The Prestbury. Self caterers can stay at Wooleigh, The Old Manse (Bovey Tracey), Hele farm or Frost farm. There are no caravan sites as such. Our area has many places to visit. A popular tourist attraction is the Rare Breeds Farm. There are also many walks in the area. Becky Falls is another attraction close by.Of course the biggest attraction is Dartmoor itself _ Bovey Tracey is known as the Gateway to Dartmoor. Special events such as the carnival also attract visitors. The visitors are mainly British but we also have French, German, Dutch, American and Canadian visitors.
